DOC.brief_summary: In present study , investigator investigate efficacy umbilical cord serum eye drop treatment patient recurrent corneal erosion . Group A treat 20 % umbilical cord serum eye drop 3 4 time day addition artificial tear , group B treat artificial tear . Ophthalmic examination include visual acuity measurement slit lamp biomicroscopy perform every month treatment . Recurrence define presence clinical symptom accompany epithelial defect cornea .
